title: League displays
body: I cant seem to get the switching wallpapers to work at all or the screen savers to activate at all. I have windows 10.

replies.body: I'm not exactly sure what might be going wrong as it doesn't seem like most players have needed to do anything special in order to get those screensavers working. I'd first try checking your general pc power settings to see how long it's set to wait before going to sleep. There might be something conflicting with your pc settings that aren't letting the display work correctly.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Mqs7dJXe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-11T01:45:19.646+0000)
>
> I'm not exactly sure what might be going wrong as it doesn't seem like most players have needed to do anything special in order to get those screensavers working. I'd first try checking your general pc power settings to see how long it's set to wait before going to sleep. There might be something conflicting with your pc settings that aren't letting the display work correctly.

Alright after playing with and looking for all my actual pc setting I fixed. Maybe add text at the bottom of the "setting" near "done" that say something along the lines of "you may need to change pc setting" or w/e. 

Had to go into my normal change wallpaper and put it on shuffle and slide show. Than in the setting make it so a screen saver is active since its automatically disabled. Than pick pictures and apply then reload and active league displays.
Your personal settings might need to be changed outside of League displays too.
